hanzi-su-wiki:
顔

Значения

Лицо; выражение лица; вид

Мнемоника

  • Овал 厂 лица, пушок 彡 и узоры 文, т.е. морщины как часть головы 頁. Каждая мысль — морщинка. Старик без морщин на лице — глуп. Умная голова придаёт лицу благообразное выражение.

  • "Когда он снимет шляпу со своей головы, вы увидете шрамы на его лице."

Варианты

顏, 颜

heisig_constituent: face, lad, vase, stand up, cliff, shape, head, page, one, ceiling, drop, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
koohiiStory1: A lad's head still has a baby's face.
koohiiStory2: When I was a lad, a pretty face was all it took for someone to get in my head, and I´d fill pages of lovelorn letters to them.
jp_example_words:
顔付き(かおつき): (outward) looks, features, face, countenance, expression
笑顔(えがお): smiling face
WaniKani_Radicals: 立, 厂, 彡, 頁
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Here you stand, a hair’s breadth away from the edge of a cliff, when out of nowhere a geoduck slaps you right in the face. Geoducks are gross, and you back away from the edge of the cliff you were standing but a hair’s breadth away from just before. Your face is all gooey from the geoduck’s slimy residue.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine being slapped in the face with a geoduck. It’s probably one of the worst things that could ever happen to someone. Those things are disgusting. Now you have geoduck goo all over your face. It’s sticky and slimy and gross.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: But where did that geoduck come from anyway? As you turn around from the cliff edge, wiping the goop from your face and out of your eyes, you see an angry cow (かお). This cow is the one who hit you in the face with this geoduck. I know not the reason, but this cow is most definitely not happy with you.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Cows are big animals. So you probably got hit in the face with that geoduck pretty hard. Feel the geoduck shaped welt starting to form on the side of your face. It’s very painful and stings a lot.
Ru_Radicals: 亠 (крышка), ハ, 厂 (скала), 彡 (украшение), 目 (глаз), 立 (стоять), 貝 (раковина), 頁 (страница)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the boy's (彦) page (頁) shows a face

顔字的基本解释

顔
yán
见“颜”。

顔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yán］
［《廣韻》五姦切，平删，疑。］
“颜1”的繁体字。“顏1”的新字形。
(1)额头。即眉上发下、两额角间部分。
(2)面容；脸色。
(3)指形貌。
(4)指脸皮。
(5)体面；面子。
(6)显著。
(7)指堂上或门楣上的匾额。
(8)指题字于匾额或书籍封面上。
(9)颜色；色彩。
(10)（排在）前面。参见“顔行”。
(11)古代帽子的一种。其形似古皮弁，以缣帛为之。
(12)姓。
[②]［yá］
［《集韻》宜佳切，平佳，疑。］
通“厓1”。“颜2”的繁体字。“顏2”的新字形。
水边；山边。

顔字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【頁字部】　顔； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1407第17
【唐韻】五姦切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】牛姦切，?眼平聲。【說文】眉目之閒也。【詩·鄘風】子之淸揚，揚且之顔也。【毛傳】顔，額角豐滿也。【左傳·僖九年】天威不違顔咫尺。【黃帝素問】心熱者，顔先赤。【揚子·方言】?、頟、顔，顙也。汝潁淮泗之閒謂之顔。　又幘顔。【輿服雜事】漢桓帝延熹中，京師作幘，皆顔短耳長，以爲服妖。　又那顔。外國語，猶華言大人。　又商顔，山名。【前漢·溝洫志】引洛水至商顔下。【註】商山之顔，猶山額也。　又孱顔，山高貌。【歐陽修詩】空碧更孱顏。　又姓。【姓苑】出琅邪。魯伯禽支庶，食采顏邑，因氏。又邾武公字顏，公羊稱顏公，後遂爲氏。　又古通眞韻，音銀。【蘇軾·祭韓忠獻文】勿心大匠，笑彼汗顔。援手拯溺，期我于仁。

顔字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
顔字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Yan
yán

Yan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yán］
["Guangyun" five traits cut, flat deleted, suspicious. ]
Traditional characters of "颜1". The new glyph of "Yan 1".
(1) Forehead. That is, the part between the eyebrows and the foreheads.
(2) Face; complexion.
(3) Refers to morphology.
(4) Refers to the face.
(5) Decent; face.
(6) Significant.
(7) Refers to the plaque on the hall or lintel.
(8) Refers to the inscription on the plaque or book cover.
(9) Color; color.
(10) (in front of). See "Yan Xing".
(11) A kind of ancient hat. Its shape resembles ancient leather, and it is made of silk.
(12) Last name.
[②]［yá］
["Ji Yun" Yi Jia cut, Ping Jia, doubt. ]
Link "Cliff 1". Traditional characters of "颜2". The new glyph of "Yan 2".
The water's edge; the mountain's edge.
Yan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Page Department】　yan; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1407 Page 17
[Tang Yun] Five evil cuts [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Bull evil cuts, flat eyes. [Said the text] The eyebrows are also leisurely. 【Poetry·Fengfeng】The son's swelling, the swelling of the face. [Mao Chuan] Yan has plump forehead. [Zuo Zhuan·Xi Jiu Nian] Tianwei does not violate his face. [Huang Di Su Wen] Those who are enthusiastic, Yan Xianchi. 【Yangtze Dialect】?, Yun, Yan, and Yan. Ruying Huaisi's leisure is called the beauty.　Yuan Yan again. 【Miscellaneous Affairs of Public Service】Emperor Yanxi of Han Huan, the master of the capital, all had short faces and long ears, thinking that he would serve the demon.　Yeah again. Foreign languages, still Chinese adults.　Shang Yan, the name of the mountain. [Former Han·Gou Xia Zhi] Leading Luoshui to Shangyanxia. [Note] The beauty of Shangshan Mountain is also like the forehead of the mountain.　The beauty of the mountain is high. [Ouyang Xiu Poetry] Kongbi is more beautiful.　Another last name. [Surname Garden] Born from Langxie. Lu Bo's poultry branch, eats Yanyi, and Yinshi. He also called Wu Gong as Yan, and Yang Yang was called Yan Gong, and later he was called Clan.　Ancient rhyme, sound and silver. [Su Shi · Offering articles to Han Zhong] Don't be a master craftsman, smile at him ashamed. Helping to save lives, expect me to be benevolent.

yán
вм. 颜

顔

Значения

Лицо; выражение лица; вид

Мнемоника

  • Овал 厂 лица, пушок 彡 и узоры 文, т.е. морщины как часть головы 頁. Каждая мысль — морщинка. Старик без морщин на лице — глуп. Умная голова придаёт лицу благообразное выражение.

  • "Когда он снимет шляпу со своей головы, вы увидете шрамы на его лице."

Варианты

顏, 颜

Radicals: 立, 厂, 彡, 頁  (stand, cliff, hair, geoduck)
Meaning Mnemonic
Here you stand, a hair’s breadth away from the edge of a cliff, when out of nowhere a geoduck slaps you right in the face. Geoducks are gross, and you back away from the edge of the cliff you were standing but a hair’s breadth away from just before. Your face is all gooey from the geoduck’s slimy residue.
Imagine being slapped in the face with a geoduck. It’s probably one of the worst things that could ever happen to someone. Those things are disgusting. Now you have geoduck goo all over your face. It’s sticky and slimy and gross.
Reading Mnemonic
But where did that geoduck come from anyway? As you turn around from the cliff edge, wiping the goop from your face and out of your eyes, you see an angry cow (かお). This cow is the one who hit you in the face with this geoduck. I know not the reason, but this cow is most definitely not happy with you.
Cows are big animals. So you probably got hit in the face with that geoduck pretty hard. Feel the geoduck shaped welt starting to form on the side of your face. It’s very painful and stings a lot.
